ThingDef.label: undead colossus
ThingDef.description: A giant, lumbering undead creature. Its heavily decomposed body makes it impossible to tell what it what it might have been in life, if it was ever alive in the first place.\n\nColossi are slow moving but can absorb a lot of damage and deliver devastating ground smashes that heavily damage walls and structures.

li.label: colossus smash
li.description: Deliver a devastating ground smash that heavily damages walls and structures.

DamageDef.label: colossus smash
DamageDef.deathMessage: {0} has been killed by a colossus smash.

ThingDef.label: ghoul
ThingDef.description: Once a human, now cursed with undeath and twisted into a ferocious, clawed fiend. Its humanity is long gone, leaving a feral creature of pure instinct.\n\nGhouls are deadly in close quarters and in in combat, will charge directly towards their victim to attack with their vicious claws.

ThingDef.Name: BotchJob_Wraith
ThingDef.label: wraith
ThingDef.description: A restless spirit trapped between life and death. It moves slowly but is unimpeded by difficult terrain. In combat, its chilling attacks cause frostbite build up and its ranged ability can pass through walls.\n\Wraiths are the source of luminous dust which is a useful crafting ingredient. It can be periodically extracted from them if they are part of the faction.

li.label: project wraith claw
li.description: Project a ghostly claw that can pass through walls and other obstacles.

DamageDef.label: wraith claw blast
DamageDef.deathMessage: {0} has been killed by a wraith claw.

ThingDef.label: skeleton
ThingDef.description: The reanimated skeletal remains of a human. It is weak in close quarters but can detach bones from itself and launch them a short distance.

li.label: bone
li.description: Throw a bone projectile in an arc that inflicts blunt damage on hit.

ThingDef.label: undead warg
ThingDef.description: An undead Warg, every bit as vicious and dangerous as its living counterpart.

ThingDef.label: undead horse
ThingDef.description: A horse, brought back from death to continue its servitude.\n\nCan be used as a pack animal and when in a caravan, people can ride horses to increase the caravan's speed.

ThingDef.label: undead cat
ThingDef.description: An undead cat.\n\nIt seems to be just as playful and affectionate as it's living counterpart, perhaps it is unaware of, or simply indifferent to its undead nature.

ThingDef.label: undead dragon
ThingDef.description: An undead dragon, just as dangerous and terrifying as its living counterpart.\n\nIts bite and fiery breath are toxic and it is able to expell several grotesque, fleshy masses to bombard an area from afar.

li.label: toxic dragon breath
li.description: Spew forth toxic, scorching dragon breath over an area.

li.label: spew putrid mass
li.description: Expell several grotesque fleshy masses which burst on impact, spreading rot stink over an area.

ThingDef.label: skeleton
ThingDef.description: Create a skeleton using a soul gem, a dark practice forbidden by most.

ThingDef.label: undead cat
ThingDef.description: Create an undead cat using a soul gem, a dark practice forbidden by most.

ThingDef.label: ghoul
ThingDef.description: Create a ghoul using a soul gem, a dark practice forbidden by most.

ThingDef.label: wraith
ThingDef.description: Create a wraith using a soul gem, a dark practice forbidden by most.

ThingDef.label: undead warg
ThingDef.description: Create an undead warg using a soul gem, a dark practice forbidden by most.

ThingDef.label: undead horse
ThingDef.description: Create an undead horse using a soul gem, a dark practice forbidden by most.

ThingDef.label: undead colossus
ThingDef.description: Create an undead colossus using a soul gem, a dark practice forbidden by most.

ThingDef.label: undead dragon
ThingDef.description: Create an undead dragon using a soul gem, a dark practice forbidden by most.
